entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:24 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:24 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:24 PM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
